usage_guide.example:
1. Press power button to turn on
2. Enable Bluetooth on your device
3. Select device from list
4. Wait for connection

formatting_rules.rule: Use proper line breaks between sections
Start each feature on new line with indent
Add blank line between different products
Present prices clearly with currency symbol
